name: HEROES OF EXILE
description:
One click-rol game based on a D&D universe I developed as an university project based on ancient Rome.

Software

  • Unity.
  • Photoshop.
  • Aseprite.

Credits

  • Code: Álvaro Rafael Aparicio García and university.
  • Art: Álvaro Rafael Aparicio García.
  • Design: Álvaro Rafael Aparicio García.

Controls

  • Attack: Left click.
  • Heavy attack: Hold right click.
  • Special: Click the golden circle.
